alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 2:49PM CDT until March 26 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Brockton, or 7 miles west of Enterprise, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Clayhatchee, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Lucile, Gerald, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Goodman, Cairns Aaf, Enterprise Municipal A/P and Richburg. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
